about_the_game:
D.V. Ex Agent - is a short narrative game with horror elements. The plot of the game is intriguing, and the gameplay conveys a sense of gradual decomposition of the subconscious. The game also contains many jokes and references.

"Do you know what can ruin a person's life? There can be many reasons. One such reason was the events that happened to the main character."

Citizen Drankov was a respected man and worked in a secret government organization. He was trusted by the leadership, which ultimately played a cruel joke on him. You will have to go through the key moments of our hero's life. Waking up on the street near garbage cans, Drankov realizes that he remembers nothing and tries to figure out what happened. His tormented mind begins to play cruel tricks on him, and the skeletons in his closet decide to perform their sinister dance.

Game Features:

- Main genre: walking simulator.
- Gameplay recreates the realities of a person suffering from delirium.

- The feeling of being in a parallel world, or rather in the world inside the subconscious at the terminal stage of delirium.
- Atmospheric sound and visual design creating a tense and mystical atmosphere.
- Some puzzles will really make you "rack your brains," they are not easy.

- A sad and dramatic plot filled with emotional content.
- And what's a game without jump scares?

Average playthrough time: 60 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of violent scenes, which may have a negative impact on the psyche. Please also be aware that the game contains hints of alcohol consumption and smoking. Some content elements may not be suitable for certain age categories. A reasonable limitation of the game's audience is recommended.

name: D.V. Ex Agent (Episode 1)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 2GB / AMD Radeon RX 460 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: "D.V. Ex Agent" is a narrative game with elements of horror, telling the dramatic story of the main character. You will have to come face to face with skeletons in the closet along with him. The events unfold in the post-Soviet era.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian*, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
